definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: In 1999, ethnic unity and progress has been exemplary Linying advanced individuals.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，获临颍县民族团结进步模范先进个人。

sentences.english: That slogan is simply a call for conscious reflection on national unity.
sentences.chinese: 这一口号仅仅是号召人民提高民族团结的觉悟。

sentences.english: We adhered to the Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy and carried forward the programs to promote unity and progress among ethnic groups.
sentences.chinese: 贯彻民族区域自治法，推进民族团结进步事业。

sentences.english: In the struggle to safeguard the unity of the nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 在维护民族团结的斗争中。

sentences.english: We must firmly uphold the national unity.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须坚定地维护民族团结。

sentences.english: First, adhere to the basic principles of national equality and national unity.
sentences.chinese: 第一，坚持民族平等和民族团结的基本原则。

sentences.english: The country needs a leader who will hold the nation together.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家需要有一个能把全民族团结起来的领袖。

definition: program of visiting Muslim households in Xinjiang to monitor them, begun in 2014 (abbr. for 訪民情、惠民生、聚民心|访民情、惠民生、聚民心[fang3 min2 qing2 , hui4 min2 sheng1 , ju4 min2 xin1])
close relationship as between fish and water
Xiaoyingpan township in Börtala Shehiri or Bole City 博樂市|博乐市, Xinjiang
Toli county in Tacheng prefecture 塔城地區|塔城地区[Ta3 cheng2 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
see 開齋節|开斋节[Kai1 zhai1 jie2]
Qeshqer Shehiri (Kashgar city) in the west of Xinjiang near Kyrgyzstan
Yenji Xuyzu aptonom nahiyisi or Yanqi Hui autonomous county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
